Hi
descriptionHtml:
GuruSR's Sun Blotto!

So, you're the big Vampire on the block, got the castle, won the whole thing.  But that one little comment about a prophecy somewhat left a bad taste in your mouth.

If you, like most, have that bad taste in your mouth and felt somewhat stiffed by the prophecy, you can finally do something about it with this mod!

High atop the highest peak in Skyrim, you'll find a familiar face, just visit that familiar face and donate.  And may your days and nights be beautiful mayhem!

Usage:  Install, Visit the high peak, do your donation, enjoy.

The mod has no affect on any vampire mods out there, it does require Dawnguard as it's using aspects from it.
author: GuruSR
